resources.string: Sappy Secrets
Sappy Mappy
Start Spying
Settings
Average Pace: %d minute mile
AI runner
player
You are poisoned by Hemlock, so you can\'t do that. Go back to HQ to get better.
Nothing here that can be built or upgraded.
Nothing here that can be interacted with.
your Shady Grove
HQ
Not enough Vine Cred to build a Shady Grove.
You built a Shady Grove, your first sappy sleuthing headquarters.
You cured your poison at the HQ. Now you feel as spry as a Sequoia!
You don\'t have the %d Intel required to upgrade your HQ.
Catch that agent!
a Seedy Sapling
Sapling
%s with %d Secrets ready for you
You persuaded the Seedy Sapling to be your informant for %d Vine Cred.
You need at least %d Vine Cred to make this sapling your informant.
You sleuthed %d Secrets from the Sapling.
This Seedy Sapling is stumped for now. Come back later.
an Analyst Aspen with no leads
an Analyst Aspen working on your lead
Aspen
The Analyst Aspen found its first lead to analyze for your %d Vine Cred and %d Secrets.
You need at least %d Vine Cred and %d Secrets to get the Aspen its first lead.
After analyzing your %d Secrets, the Aspen gives you %d Intel.
You need %d Secrets for the Aspen to analyze for Intel.
One of your Analyst Aspens lost their lead after too long with no new Secrets.
a Hemlock Haven
Hemlock
A Hemlock begins chasing you! Run away! Quick!
You outran the Hemlock. Whew! Good work.
The Hemlock caught you and poisoned you. Go back to HQ to get better.
Game started.
You got more Vine Cred!
Vine Cred!
You have discovered %s!
You have %d Vine Cred
You have no Vine Cred
%d Secrets
%d Intel
Walk or jog around the neighborhood to get Vine Cred. You will hear this sound when you collect a Vine Cred.
We need %d Vine Cred before we can set up our first headquarters.
You have enough Vine Cred for your first headquarters, the Shady Grove. Choose a central location to build your headquarters and double-click your headphones play button to build it.
Now that we\'ve grown our Shady Grove, let\'s go investigate the area. Try double-clicking to upgrade and clicking to interact with every site you discover.
Nice work finding a Seedy Sapling. Can we turn it to our side?
I\'m glad that Seedy Sapling is working for us now.
Now we have Secrets, but we need to find a way to understand them.
Something has gone wrong. Take that Intel back to HQ!
You\'ve been poisoned. Go back to HQ for antidote.
and
You are approaching %s.
The Hemlock is chasing you, run fast!
Sappy Secrets GPS Tracker
Tracking location for Sappy Secretsâ€¦
That\'s the double agent! Chase it!
The double agent got away. Maybe we can find him again?
You caught the double agent!
Nice work! It\'s a Dogwood Double Agent. We need to find out what this means for the Oak Empire, but you\'ve earned your mission reward.
This is the end of the demo. Thanks for playing! Please send any feedback you have to Jamie to crush his dreams and improve this game!
